heading: HR00606
0: RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING AND COMMENDING THE PHILIPPINE ATHLETES FOR THEIR EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE DURING THE 30TH SOUTHEAST ASIAN GAMES HELD IN DIFFERENT VENUES IN THE COUNTRY
mother-bill statusstatus: Adopted as Resolution No. HR00050 on 2020-03-10 Substituted by HR00776
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00606
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING AND COMMENDING THE PHILIPPINE ATHLETES FOR THEIR EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE DURING THE 30TH SOUTHEAST ASIAN GAMES HELD IN DIFFERENT VENUES IN THE COUNTRY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BAUTISTA, CLAUDINE DIANA D.
DATE FILED : 2019-12-12
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2020-02-04
          -The body directed the Secretariat to prepare the substitute resolution to these measures and their corresponding committee reports.
          -Initial deliberation of HR Nos. 573, 596, 601, 605, 606, 608, 622 and 640 (Congratulating and commending national athletes who won gold, silver and bronze medals in the 30th Southeast Asian Games as well as the organizing committee for its successful hosting)
      2. Measure approved by the Committee on 2020-02-04
      3. Draft of Substitute/Amended/Consolidated Measure prepared on 2020-02-18
      4. Committee Report approved on 2020-03-10
          -Adopted as Resolution No. HR00050
      5. Prepared and Transmitted the required copies of Committee Report on 2020-03-10
      6. Committee Report filed on 2020-03-10
          -House Committee Report No. 00278, Substituted by HR00776
      7. Referred the Committee Report to the Committee on Rules (OB) on 2020-03-10
      8. Approved for Inclusion in the Calendar of Business on 2020-03-10
MOTHER BILL: HR00776
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT ON 2019-12-18
